name: Fortune Boat
close_time: Open Open for Lunch and Dinner (will update soon)
description: Fortune Boat was a wonderful find. It's a Chinese restaurant, hidden just off Independence Square near the newly refurbished Colombo Racecourse. You'd never spot it unless you happened to be walking round there.
tip:
As is the case with most places, the bill comes to rather a lot if you order drinks. We accidentally ordered a rather potent cocktail which cost Rs. 1000. So maybe just stick with table water.

Happy Hour is 6.30 to 7.30
